events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position through the company career portal.
The recruitment team reviewed the application and categorized it under the Engineering cluster based on the role and skills mentioned.
A recruiter specializing in software development positions was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process for better alignment.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to evaluate the candidateâ€™s experience with relevant software engineering technologies.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the technical interview process.
The technical interview was scheduled for the candidate with the lead engineer to assess coding skills and problem-solving ability.
